name: cloudgenie
0:
”Alexa, open cloud genie”
”Alexa, ask cloud genie what's new in GCP”
”Alexa, tell cloud genie to give me the latest news in Microsoft cloud”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cloud genie
des:
Ask Alexa for the latest (3 days) news from the major cloud provider (currently AWS, Azure, and GCP).
The news are fetched from the what's new or blog rss feed from every provider.

It's possible to filter the result per cloud provider specifying its name in the request, for example:
'Alexa, ask cloud genie to tell me the latest news from X'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
